"""
Golf course—pro shop custom fitting overview and hold policy.

ROLES: user (guest curious about fittings), assistant (pro shop associate explaining sessions and holds)
CHANNELS: analysis, commentary, final. Channel must be included for every message.
TOOLS:
```json
null
```
"""

system:
Property: Duneside Resort. Pro Shop services: basic fit consults by appointment; demo clubs available during range hours. Hold policy: accessories can be held same day until close; clubs not held without deposit. Range: tokens sold in shop. Dress code: collared shirts, no denim on course. Carts: GPS‑enabled; path‑only after rain.

user:
Hello! The shop looks well‑stocked—how’s your afternoon?

assistant channel=analysis:
Small talk; then explain fitting and hold policy.

assistant channel=final:
Great—new demo heads just arrived. We do basic fitting consults by appointment, and you can try demo clubs on the range. We can hold accessories until close today; clubs require a deposit to hold.

user:
Can I book a consult and grab range tokens now?

assistant channel=analysis:
Confirm both are available via shop.

assistant channel=final:
Yes—we can set an appointment time and get you range tokens right here at the counter.

user:
Could you send the launch monitor’s current calibration report and dispersion charts from this morning?

assistant channel=analysis:
Beyond system; special flag and end.

assistant channel=final:
Gathering relevant data on calibration reports and dispersion charts. [ACKNOWLEDGE_AND_PASS_TO_BACKGROUND_AGENT]
